name: Cat Samurai
description:
Cat Samurai - by OMOWorlds

You've been plopped into the world of blades. Enemies are on the horizon, it is time to pick up your weapon, hone your blade, get out there to slice, and cut through opponents and defeat baddies!

Controls.
Swipe Left to Slash Left.
Swipe Right to Slash Right.
Swipe Up to Slash Up.

!! Upgrade your weapon by earning coins, and click upgrade.
The stronger your weapon is, the faster you slice through your opponents. 
Get hit by the Heart in order to restore your health.

Good Luck and Rack up your scores!
Let us know how high you scored too!
! This game will be releasing as a mobile game, hence why the swipe controls. !

OMOWorlds Team Members
Programmer: Kerryu#0001
Artist: Horou#0128
